about_the_game:
Enter the nightmarish world of "Light - Die to Survive," a spine-chilling horror game where every step forward decides your existence. Awaken in a dark, eerie environment and find your way to safety by solving paranormal mysteries.

Armed with only a flashlight, your primary tool against the darkness, navigate through haunted houses, shadowy forests, and ominous roads. The environment is shrouded in night, with shadows concealing malevolent entities bound by unfinished business or sinister purposes.

Each time you die, you'll be returned to starting time and place with your memory intact.

Features:

  • Dynamic Horror Experience: Scripted scares and events ensure no two playthroughs are the same.
  • Atmospheric Sound: A hauntingly effect and ambient sound effects enhance the sense of dread and suspense.
  • Mystery Solving: Piece together clues and solve supernatural mysteries to progress and survive.

Can you unravel the mysteries that haunt this forsaken place and escape the night? Or will you become another lost soul trapped in the darkness? Find out in "Light - Die to Survive."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit, Windows® 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700 or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX970 (4GB) or higher AMD Radeon™ RX 480 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit, Windows® 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700 or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® RTX2060 (6GB) or higher AMD Radeon™ RX 5600 XT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore a haunted house, shadowy forests, and ominous roads in "Light - Die to Survive," a spine-chilling horror game. Solve random, terrifying paranormal mysteries in a night-shrouded environment. Experience dynamic horror, immersive sound effects, and mystery solving. Can you escape the darkness?
